Class XMLIndexer

java.lang.Object
alix.lucene.XMLIndexer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class XMLIndexer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
A worker for parallel lucene indexing.
